member.name: T:TehPers.Core.Api.DependencyInjection.Lifecycle.IEventHandler`1
member.summary:
A handler for lifecycle events (such as UpdateTicked or SaveLoaded), or for custom events created by other mods.
It is recommended that you implement this interface explicitly rather than implicitly. The event handler is most likely used by a separate service that doesn't care about your specific type, but instead only cares that it implements . Because of that, it is unlikely you want the event handler to be visible as part of your type's public API.
member.typeparam: The type of arguments the event propagates.
